definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Near Mohammed Sultan, Clarke Quay, Great World City, Orchard Road, Killinery.
sentences.chinese: 穆罕默德蘇丹，克拉碼頭，躋身世界大都會，烏節路。

sentences.english: Another project was presented by OMA that operated with architectural shapes.
sentences.chinese: 大都會建築事務的另一方案是操作建築模型。

sentences.english: Four years ago, Metrojet had four aircraft [under management]; today we have 26.
sentences.chinese: 四年前，大都會有四架，現在已經達到了26架。

sentences.english: All of the contents of that house were bequeathed by Carter to the Metropolitan Museum.
sentences.chinese: 那個房子裏的所有東西都被卡特遺贈給大都會博物館。

sentences.english: Near Mohammed Sultan, Clarke Quay, Great World City, Orchard Road, Killiney.
sentences.chinese: 穆罕默德蘇丹，克拉碼頭，躋身世界大都會，烏節路。

sentences.english: It is no longer confined to only metropolitans or cosmopolitans in India.
sentences.chinese: 它不再是隻限於印度的城市或大都會。

sentences.english: and it is a little different from the Metropolitan
sentences.chinese: 有點不同於大都會博物館。

sentences.english: MetLife said it expected the deal to close at the end of the year.
sentences.chinese: 大都會保險表示，交易預期將於年底完成。

sentences.english: 1872 - In New York City the Metropolitan Museum of Art opens.
sentences.chinese: 1872年的今天，大都會藝術博物館在紐約開館。

sentences.english: Or there is our main metropolitan city, Toronto, on the east coast.
sentences.chinese: 在東海岸的多倫多，那是我們重要的大都會。

sentences.english: Both Prudential and Metropolitan Life have their origins in fraternalism.[28]
sentences.chinese: 保德信和大都會人壽均有着共濟會社的淵源。

sentences.english: Dr. Kallen reviewed data from hospitals in nine metropolitan areas of the United States.
sentences.chinese: 卡倫醫生查閱了美國九個大都會地區醫院的資料。

sentences.english: Mets fall to 2-41, continuing slide that started in September of 2007.
sentences.chinese: 大都會接續上一季九月的表現，累計2勝41敗。

sentences.english: I started at the downtown campus of Metropolitan Community College.
sentences.chinese: 我首先探訪了市區的大都會社區大學。

sentences.english: What did you see at the Metropolitan Museum?
sentences.chinese: 你在大都會藝術博物館都看到什麼了？

sentences.english: The Liverpool Metropole is my favourite .
sentences.chinese: 利物浦大都會酒店是我的最愛。

definition: not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
miniature version of sth/microcosm/epitome/(Tw) to microfilm
